name: wipro_digital_test_exercise
description: a test exercise for wipro digital as a part of recruitment process

scripts.babel: mkdirp dist/app && babel app/config.js app/forecast/forecast.services.js app/app.js --presets es2015 --plugins transform-es2015-modules-umd > dist/app/app.js
scripts.build: npm run-script babel && cp index.html dist/

author: op1ekun@borntoco.de
